metadata.title: Chickpeas Sundal- Made in the Instant Pot. Instant Pot Recipes
metadata.description:
Chickpeas is cooked in the instant pot and Sundal is made out of it in the instant pot as well. Chickpeas Sundal is a South Indian snack, chick peas is stir fried with onion, grated coconut and some seasonings. Tastes delicious and a filling snack.

For more Instant Pot recipes, click here: http://bit.ly/2C6hvqr
FOLLOW ME HERE:

Website: http://www.thasneen.com/cooking/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CookingwithThas/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cookingwiththas/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/thasneen
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/thasneen/

transcription: [00:00.000] Take 1 cup chickpeas and wash them thoroughly under running water.
[00:10.000] Add the chickpeas to the Instant Pot along with 3 cups of water and a pinch of salt.
[00:20.000] Close the lid, select high pressure and cook until the chickpeas are soft and cooked through.
[00:35.000] Once done, release pressure naturally and open the Instant Pot lid.
[00:45.000] Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in the Instant Pot on sauté mode.
[00:55.000] Add mustard seeds and cumin seeds, wait for them to splutter.
[01:05.000] Add chopped onions, green chilies and curry leaves. Sauté until onions turn translucent.
[01:20.000] Add turmeric powder and salt to taste, mix well with the sautéed mixture.
[01:35.000] Add the cooked chickpeas along with any remaining cooking water.
[01:50.000] Stir everything together and let it simmer on sauté mode for a few minutes.
[02:05.000] Add grated coconut, combine well with the chickpeas and seasonings.
[02:25.000] Continue to cook for 2–3 more minutes until the coconut is well mixed and warmed through.
[02:40.000] Turn off the Instant Pot sauté mode once the Sundal has absorbed the flavors.
[02:50.000] Transfer the Chickpeas Sundal to a serving bowl.
[03:00.000] Garnish with a few extra curry leaves or grated coconut if desired.
[03:10.000] Serve the Chickpeas Sundal hot as a snack or side dish.
[03:20.000] It’s a nutritious, protein‑rich South Indian snack ready to enjoy!
